title: Goombella

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Tattle**: Learn a target's alignment or subalignment, your choice.
- **Rally Wink** (3x, day): Pick a Koopa, they may do a second night action tonight, as long as the second action isn't attacking anyone.
- **Tips and Tricks** (1x): Roleblock up to 2 player you have previously **Tattle**d.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If killed, your killers will learn the last **Tattle** feedback you recieved.

desc:
Post 1450
*Goombella is a smart, if sassy, Goomba girl. She hopes to be an archaeologist one day.*
